heading: HR00775
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE TO ASSESS THE POSSIBLE EFFECTS OF THE IMMIGRATION BAN POLICY OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA (USA)  ON FILIPINOS IN THE US WITH THE END IN VIEW OF RECOMMENDING APPROPRIATE GOVERNMENT ACTION OR POLICY AS WELL AS TO URGE THE DUTERTE ADMINISTRATION TO APPOINT A PHILIPPINE AMBASSADOR TO THE USA TO ALLAY THE FEARS AND CONFUSION BY FILIPINO COMMUNITIES SURROUNDING THE IMMIGRATION BAN POLICY
status: Pending with the Committee on FOREIGN AFFAIRS since 2017-03-07
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00775
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE TO ASSESS THE POSSIBLE EFFECTS OF THE IMMIGRATION BAN POLICY OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA (USA) ON FILIPINOS IN THE US WITH THE END IN VIEW OF RECOMMENDING APPROPRIATE GOVERNMENT ACTION OR POLICY AS WELL AS TO URGE THE DUTERTE ADMINISTRATION TO APPOINT A PHILIPPINE AMBASSADOR TO THE USA TO ALLAY THE FEARS AND CONFUSION BY FILIPINO COMMUNITIES SURROUNDING THE IMMIGRATION BAN POLICY
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2017-02-09
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON FOREIGN AFFAIRS ON 2017-03-07
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2017-02-15;
